ing: 2 1/2 cups chopped sweet onion (such as VidaliaÂ®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A quick and tasty dip that is delicious on Triscuits or with baked bread. Simple, easy, and delicious. Perfect for the last-minute party. Serve piping hot."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Stir onion, mayonnaise, and mozzarella cheese together in a casserole dish; season with salt and pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven until top is beginning to brown, 25 to 30 minutes.
